#Create a Dataset object from files containing the data and optionally metadata.

= Introduction =

The Dataset class is the main data type of this package. Many functions of the package are operations on a Dataset object. A Dataset object can be created by calling the "new" function in one of the following possible ways.

new("Dataset", metabolomicsDataFile, phenoDataFile, ...)
